headerDisplay: An account to link your [ADT Pulse](https://portal.adtpulse.com/) system to Homebridge is required. This will be used to control your security panel and read sensor status.
footerDisplay:
If you need assistance, you may read the [plugin instructions](https://github.com/mrjackyliang/homebridge-adt-pulse#readme) or feel free to [create a bug report](https://github.com/mrjackyliang/homebridge-adt-pulse/issues/new?template=bug_report.md).

__Show your appreciation for its continued development by making a small donation to my company, [CBN Ventures](https://cbnventures.io), through [PayPal](https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=L59Y27M66FG26&source=url).__

name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log

username.title: Username
username.description: The email address used to login at https://portal.adtpulse.com/

password.title: Password
password.description: The password used to login at https://portal.adtpulse.com/

logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: Higher levels mean more logs will show. Turn on Debug Mode for levels 40 and 50. Recommended setting is "Info (Level 30)".
